CustomObject.description: Mapping for the trigger creating new Sageworks workflow when a Financial Account with the Proposed Commercial Loan record type is created. References SW_Proposed_Product__c field in Salesforce Financial Account object and workflowTemplateId field in Sageworks Workflow object.
CustomObject.label: SW Proposed Product to Workflow Mapping
CustomObject.pluralLabel: SW Proposed Product to Workflow Mappings
